room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Ideal Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Our family had a great time doing the Wild West escape! We made it out 3 minutes before our time was up. We will go back for sure. A very nice and helpful staff!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Ideal Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Did they Wild West room Friday night, so much fun! Loved the details that went into this. Also the staff is amazing! Thanks for a great adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Ideal Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: We had a great time in the Wild West room! The room was nicely done and detailed, and the staff was great. It's fun for all ages and fun to work together as a group. Can't wait to come back and try the other rooms very soon.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Ideal Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Had a great time in the Wild West room for a friends birthday! We were so close at the end they let us go five minutes over so we could figure it out. It is great bonding and an hour went by so fast!
